name: love, nora
description:
“Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.” - Coco Chanel

You two were the perfect love story. Next door neighbors, high school sweethearts, and now, you are finally together. But oftentimes, good things fall apart. You navigate a bittersweet journey coming to terms with death, loss, and painful regrets. 

Content warning: death/dying

Features

  • Visual novel with original art and story 
  • Pretty short, about 5 - 10 minutes each play-through
  • 4 possible endings
  • Also available for Windows and Mac

Credits

  • Music
    • Patience - Joseph Earwicker
    • Leave Me Here - Joseph Earwicker
  • Art + writing by me
  • Made with Unity and Fungus

Made for the “I Can’t Write But Want To Tell A Story” game jam. The theme was lost, and this is a story about the people we’ve lost and how we often feel lost along the way. 

This is the first game I’ve ever made, and I had a lot of fun! :) Thank you so much for stopping by!
